resources.string: 아래 이용약관에 동의해 주십시요.\n데이터 초기화에 2분 정도 소요 됩니다.
데이터 초기화에 2분 정도 소요 됩니다.\n초기화 후, 듣고 싶은 음악을 즐겨찾기에 추가해 사용하십시요! 1,550곡 즐감!

[이용 약관]
서비스 이용을 위한 통신비용은 별도로 사용자가 부담하며, 통신환경에 대하여는 어플 제공자가 보장할 수 없습니다. 가능한 통신환경이 좋은 조건에서 서비스 이용 희망 (WiFi 지역 best)

처음 설치하면, 7일간 무료로 이용 가능합니다. 그 이후는 쿠폰을 구매하여 이용할 수 있습니다.
1분간 음악 미리듣기 제공
쿠폰을 구매하면 30일간 모든 음악을 듣기 가능

음악을 메인화면에서 다운로드 후 통신이 안되는 환경에서 듣기를 하거나, 다운로드 없이 통신이 가능한 환경에서 듣기가 가능합니다.

어플을 삭제하면, 쿠폰 정보 및 남아있는 서비스 기간 정보가 지워지므로 주의를 요합니다.
 
이용약관을 동의하셔야 기능을 이용하실 수 있습니다. 감사합니다.

[간단 사용 방법]
 1. 메인 화면에서 쿠폰 구매
 2. 콘텐츠 관리 화면에서 듣고 싶은 곡을 즐겨찾기로 구성
 3. 메인 화면에서 Player 동작
 4. 1분 미리듣기는 메인 화면에서 이용
 5. 메인화면에서 즐겨찾기 삭제 가능
 6. 자세한 설명은 도움말 참조
Busy is not the behavior of!
Set the number of repeated listening
This behavior is only possible to stop the state!
Want to hear a few times repeatedly!
Listening to music has been completed!
It is recommended that you use the default player!
Do you want to see how the background?
데이터를 입력 후, Post 버튼을 누르세요!

1. Overview
 Listening to Music series with the main players in the house has been configured.
 Provides the basic player is free advertising, but all of these functions are provided.
 The house is a series of paid ads are not available. Repeat feature whole songs, however, is limited.
 In addition to the default built-in music player, as well as its own series, if the series at home to buy a house you can listen to the music.
 Therefore, it is recommended to use the default player.

 2. MediaPlayer action
 - Play: listen to music when you
 - Pause: temporarily stop the music when you want to listen.
 - Stop: Stop the music when you want to listen.
 - Continued: Then paused again, listening to music when you want to
 - Previous songs: 'Repeat' mode when you want to hear the old songs.
 - Next song: 'Repeat' mode when you want to hear the next song.

 3. Setup Preferences
 3.1 listening mode
 - Whole song repeat: repeat all songs, regardless of the song selection will hear
 - Selection is repeated: the selected songs will hear repeatedly
 - Whole song one time: all the songs, regardless of the song selection will hear only once
 - Song selection only once: the selected songs will hear only once
 - 1 song listening: If you select the song you want to listen, he will hear the song
 3.2. Repeat count
 - Set the number of repeated listening (choice of one to 10 times)

 3.3 time to listen
 - Set the time to listen to music: a set number of minutes, and takes precedence over the number of iterations. When set to 0, the number of iterations applied

 3.4 Listening to music
 - Internal memory and SD card to listen to music stored on performing
 - SD card, listening to music under the MusicPE Directory
 - Series application has been copied to the SD can listen to music

 3.5 Set the order for Listening to music
 - Stored in internal memory, music and music stored on an SD card set up between the sequence
 - To modify the order by clicking on the music selection on the left side of the yellow color appears stating that the square
 - It is based on
 + Up: Move up the selected song
 + Down: Move down the selected song

 3.6 Selection
 - CheckBox and selection is to select, toggle is

 3.7 volume control
 - Adjust the size of the listening volume

 3.8 progress bar
 - Play time, full time, being played by the progress bar displays the situation
 - Changed the progress of a cycle of 1 second

 3.9 back to the top
 - Return to initial screen
